moveToSplitScreen.description: Opens a split screen view and moves this tab to it

closeTabsToRight.name: Close Tabs to the Right
closeTabsToRight.description: Close all tabs to the right-hand side of this tab

closeOtherTabs.name: Close other Tabs
closeOtherTabs.description: Close all tabs except this tab

global.name: Install Globally
global.description: Global extensions are accessible in all of your projects

local.name: Install Locally
local.description: Local extensions are only accessible inside of the projects you add them to

toggleReadOnly.name: Toggle Read-Only Mode
toggleReadOnly.description: Toggle read-only mode for the currently opened file

keepInTabSystem.name: Keep in Tab System
keepInTabSystem.description: Converts this tab to a permanent tab

importBrproject.name: Import Project

goToDefinition.description: Go to the definition of the selected symbol

goToSymbol.name: Go to Symbol
goToSymbol.description: Opens a dialog to select a symbol to go to

changeAllOccurrences.name: Change All Occurrences
changeAllOccurrences.description: Change all occurrences of the selected text

recompileChanges.name: Compile Changes
recompileChanges.description: Compile all files that were edited without bridge. This will not compile any changes made in the editor itself after disabling watch mode

togglePackExplorer.name: Toggle Pack Explorer
togglePackExplorer.description: Toggle the pack explorer that appears inside of bridge.'s sidebar

openFileSearch.name: Open Find & Replace
openFileSearch.description: Opens a new Find & Replace tab

refresh.name: Refresh Project
refresh.description: Fetch the current project for newly added files

noProjectView.noProjectsFound: It does not look like you have any projects yet!
noProjectView.projectNoLongerExists: It looks like this project no longer exists!

restartWatchMode.name: Restart Watch Mode
restartWatchMode.description: Restart the compiler's watch mode to delete the current build output, rebuild the complete project and then start watching for further changes.
restartWatchMode.confirmDescription: Are you sure that you want to restart the compiler's watch mode? This can take some time depending on the size of your project. Restarting the compiler deletes your add-on from the com.mojang folder and recompiles it based on your bridge. folder!

projectConfig.name: Open Project Config
projectConfig.missing: It looks like this project has no config.json file. Every project needs a project config in order to work correctly.

fileDiagnostics.fileUnused: This file is not used within your project

watchModeActive.name: Watch Mode
watchModeActive.description: Enable or disable automatically recompiling files when you make changes with bridge.

autoFetchChangedFiles.name: Auto Fetch
autoFetchChangedFiles.description: Automatically search the project for changed files upon starting bridge.

logs.name: Logs
logs.noLogs: Dash did not produce any logs to show yet.

default.name: Default Config
default.description: Run bridge.'s compiler with the default compiler configuration that is part of your project's "config.json" file.

cavesAndCliffs.name: Caves and Cliffs
cavesAndCliffs.description: Enables auto-completions for the new mountain generation inside of biomes.

holidayCreatorFeatures.name: Holiday Creator Features
holidayCreatorFeatures.description: Enables auto-completions for the data driven item and block features.

creationOfCustomBiomes.name: Creation of Custom Biomes
creationOfCustomBiomes.description: Enables the creation of custom biomes, features and feature rules.

additionalModdingCapabilities.name: Additional Modding Capabilities
additionalModdingCapabilities.description: Enables the Scripting API in the manifest and allows you to create scripts with auto-completions.

upcomingCreatorFeatures.name: Upcoming Creator Features
upcomingCreatorFeatures.description: Enables the creation of fog volume files and provides auto-completions for entity properties.

enableGameTestFramework.name: Beta APIs
enableGameTestFramework.description: Enables the beta level script API related modules in the manifest and allows you to create scripts with auto-completions.

experimentalMolangFeatures.name: Experimental Molang Features
experimentalMolangFeatures.description: Enables auto-completions for experimental Molang queries.

theWildUpdate.name: The Wild Update
theWildUpdate.description: Enables auto-completions for new features introduced in the Wild Update, such as entity components.

educationEdition.name: Enable Education Edition
educationEdition.description: Enables auto-completions for education features such as material reducer recipes.

createProject.welcomeDescription: Please create your first project in order to get started.
createProject.title: Create Project

projectName.name: Project Name
projectName.invalidLetters: Project name must not contain the following characters: "  \ / : | < >  * ? ~
projectName.mustNotBeEmpty: You must enter a project name
projectName.endsInPeriod: Project name cannot end with a period

createProject.rpAsBpDependency: Register resource pack as behavior pack dependency

tick.name: tick.json

skins.description: Register the skins you have created

blocks.name: blocks.json

terrainTexture.name: terrain_texture.json
terrainTexture.description: Used to assign textures to block faces

itemTexture.name: item_texture.json
itemTexture.description: Used to assign textures to items

biomesClient.name: biomes_client.json
biomesClient.description: Used to define how biome specific effects render

sounds.name: sounds.json
sounds.description: Used to define sounds for specific game features

soundDefinitions.name: sound_definitions.json
soundDefinitions.description: Used to register ids for sound files to be used elsewhere in the project

createPreset.title: Create Preset
createPreset.overwriteFiles: This preset overwrites one or more existing files. Do you want to continue?
createPreset.overwriteUnsavedChanges: This preset overwrites one or more files with unsaved changes. Do you want to continue?

validationRule.alphanumeric: You may only use alphanumeric characters and/or underscores
validationRule.lowercase: You may only use lowercase letters
validationRule.noEmptyFolderNames: Folder name may not be empty

disabledPreset.experimentalGameplay: Required experimental gameplay toggle condition(s) not met
disabledPreset.manifestDependency: Required BP manifest dependencies are missing

deleteProject.description: Are you sure you want to delete this project?

shrinkSidebarElements.name: Shrink Sidebar Elements
shrinkSidebarElements.description: Shrink the size of bridge.'s sidebar elements

language.name: Language
language.description: Choose a language for bridge. to use

collaborativeMode.name: Collaborative Mode
collaborativeMode.description: Forces full refresh of the cache upon switching projects. Disable when you work alone and you only use bridge. to edit your project

packSpider.name: Pack Spider
packSpider.description: Pack Spider connects files inside of your projects and presents the connections to you in a virtual file system

formatOnSave.name: Format On Save
formatOnSave.description: Formats your text files upon saving them

openLinksInBrowser.name: Open Links in Default Browser
openLinksInBrowser.description: Open links inside of your default browser instead of a native app window

restoreTabs.name: Restore Tabs
restoreTabs.description: Restore your tabs from when you last used bridge. upon opening the app

devMode.description: Enable the developer mode for this app

defaultAuthor.name: Default Author
defaultAuthor.description: The default author for new projects

loadComMojangProjects.name: Load com.mojang Projects
loadComMojangProjects.description: Automatically load projects from the com.mojang folder

jsonEditor.name: JSON Editor
jsonEditor.description: Choose how you want to edit JSON files

bridgePredictions.name: bridge. Predictions
bridgePredictions.description: Enable bridge. predictions to let the app intelligently decide whether to add a value or object within bridge.'s tree editor. This simplifies editing JSON significantly

bracketPairColorization.name: Bracket Pair Colorization
bracketPairColorization.description: Give matching brackets an unique color

wordWrap.name: Word Wrap
wordWrap.description: Wrap words to disable horizontal scrolling

wordWrapColumns.name: Word Wrap Columns
wordWrapColumns.description: Defines after how many columns the editor should wrap words

compactTabDesign.name: Compact Tab Design
compactTabDesign.description: Display tabs inside of the tab system in a more compact way

keepTabsOpen.name: Keep Tabs Open
keepTabsOpen.description: By default, opening a new tab closes the previously opened tab if it was not interacted with

automaticallyOpenTreeNodes.name: Automatically Open Tree Nodes
automaticallyOpenTreeNodes.description: Inside of bridge.'s tree editor, automatically open nodes when you select them

dragAndDropTreeNodes.description: Disable/enable drag & drop for tree nodes inside of bridge.'s tree editor

showArrayIndices.description: Show indices for array elements inside of bridge.'s tree editor

hideBracketsWithinTreeEditor.name: Hide Brackets

projectFolder.title: Project Folder
projectFolder.content: bridge. needs access to its project folder in order to work correctly.

extensionStore.offlineError: Failed to load extensions. Please confirm that your device has an active network connection.

compilerPluginDownload.title: Downloaded Compiler Plugin
compilerPluginDownload.description: You have just downloaded a new compiler plugin. Make sure to add it to your compiler config file or otherwise it won't have an effect.

unsavedFile.description: Do you want to save your changes to this file before closing it?

browserUnsupported.title: Browser Warning
browserUnsupported.description: In order to get the best experience with bridge., you need to use Chrome (excluding Chrome 93/94) or Edge (Chromium) on desktop. If you continue, you will not be able to save files directly and you will need to download your project in order to save it or test your changes in Minecraft.

invalidJson.title: Invalid JSON
invalidJson.description: bridge.'s tree editor cannot open files that contain invalid JSON. You can switch to the "Raw Text" editor type inside of the settings to manually fix the issue.

upgradeFs.title: Upgrade File System?
upgradeFs.description: Your browser now supports saving files directly to your computer. Do you want to upgrade now?

packIndexing.title: Indexing Packs
packIndexing.description: bridge. is collecting data about your pack that is needed for its intelligent features

compiler.title: Compiling Project
compiler.description: bridge. is compiling your project to make it ready for import into Minecraft

unzipper.name: Unpacking ZIP
unzipper.description: bridge. is currently unpacking a ZIP file.

loadingSchemas.name: Loading Auto-Completions

openFile.description2: and save edits to the original file.

comMojang.title: Access to folder "com.mojang"
comMojang.permissionRequest: bridge. needs access to your "com.mojang" folder in order to compile projects to it.

status.sucess: Syncing your projects to com.mojang is setup correctly.
status.deniedPermission: You setup com.mojang syncing but you did not grant bridge. permission to the folder.
status.notSetup: You have not setup com.mojang syncing yet. Drag your com.mojang folder onto bridge. to do so.
status.notAvailable: Syncing projects to the com.mojang folder is only available for Chrome and Edge users.

findAndReplace.noSearch: Once you start typing, results for your search query will appear here.

preview.name: Preview
preview.failedClientEntityLoad: Failed to load connected client entity
preview.invalidEntity: Cannot open preview for an entity with invalid JSON. Please fix JSON errors inside of the file and try again.
preview.noGeometry: No valid geometry found inside of this file. Make sure that your JSON is valid, that the file structure is correct and that a geometry with the provided identifier exists.

lootTableSimulator.emptyLootOutput: Output is empty, try running the loot table to collect results.

initialSetup.welcomeCaption: A powerful IDE for Minecraft Add-Ons

installApp.name: Install bridge.
installApp.description: Click here to install bridge. v2 as an app to your device.

bridge.name: bridge. Folder
bridge.description: Please create a folder where bridge. can save app related data and your add-on projects.

bridgeProject.name: bridge. Project
bridgeProject.description: Do you want to create a new project or import an existing project from a .brproject file?

comMojang.name: com.mojang Folder
comMojang.description: Drag your com.mojang folder onto bridge. to setup syncing of projects to this folder. This makes your add-ons accessible inside of Minecraft for Windows 10 automatically. Setting up com.mojang syncing can be done at any point in time while bridge. is open.
comMojang.extraDescription: Drag your com.mojang folder onto bridge.

editorType.name: Choose Editor Type
editorType.description: How do you want to edit JSON files? You can change your choice inside of bridge.'s settings later!

rawText.name: Raw Text
rawText.description: Edit JSON as raw text. Ideal for intermediate to advanced developers. Comes with advanced auto-completions and JSON validation.

treeEditor.name: Tree Editor
treeEditor.description: Edit JSON as a tree-like structure that requires little to no JSON knowledge. Ideal for beginners and intermediate creators.

noValue.errorMessage: Language keys must be assigned a value
noValue.quickFix: Add a value to this key

argumentNoSupport.name: Argument {{$1}} does not support {{$2}}
argumentNoSupport.bothConditions: Argument {{$1}} does not support multiple instances when not all negated

invalidSelectorArgumentValue.name: Invalid selector argument value {{$1}} for argument {{$2}}
